text: hey everyone wanted to pop in here real
quick and address something that's been
happening in the last week in my comment
section so in case you don't know what's
going on let me fill you in a few days
ago i posted a photo in the community
tab on youtube asking people to text me
using my texting program which is
something i've been doing for a long
time it's kind of like an email list by
text message and i do try to personally
respond to as many people as i can
throughout my day however soon after i
posted that i started getting all these
comments of people saying that they were
getting marketing by third party
advertisers and they were accusing me of
selling their information for the record
i do not sell or give away any
information why would i ever do that and
i had no idea what was going on and i
was really confused and my team and i
couldn't figure out maybe that there was
a mistake with the texting platform so i
deleted the post and hopes that i could
figure it out with my team days and days
later and we still can't find out what
happened or if it happened or even seen
any concrete examples of this happening
i can assure you it is not coming from
me or anyone on my team because why
would i ever want to sell your numbers
why would i ever get any benefit from
that this is absolutely ridiculous so
i'm asking anybody out there if you have
received one of these text messages from
third party marketers and you feel like
you've been spamming please screenshot
that and send an email to the drewbinski
team at gmail.com so my team can look at
it and see what is going on in the past
i've been hacked on facebook and i
always had these imposters creating fake
accounts on social media and pretending
to be me and commenting as me and it's
really annoying so if you have any of
these concrete examples of specifically
these third-party spammers then please
send an email to my team meanwhile as
all this situation was going on i've
been traveling i'm here with filming my
documentary with my crew i'm in jamaica
country number 196 and i've been super
busy didn't have much internet so i
wasn't able to address the situation
until now i apologize if it is not as
quick as you preferred but my team and i
really needed to dive in and figure out
what is the root of this problem again i
have never and will never give away any
information that you entrust with me to
others so please rest assured of that
meanwhile i'm going to continue
traveling in jamaica creating awesome
content and tomorrow my very first video
in my palau series is coming out it's
going to be incredible i worked really
hard on it and i know you guys are going
to love it so that being said i'll see
you tomorrow in the next video
